price: Follow the best of what has been sent down to you all from your Lord, before the punishment comes upon you by surprise while you are unaware,
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓاْ أَحۡسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
